Returns the portal payment settings.

<StatusCodes

  responses={{"200":{"description":"Payment settings: sales email, feedback and support URL, link to pay for a portal, Standalone or not, current license, maximum quota quantity","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"required":["buyUrl","currentLicense","max","salesEmail","standalone"],"type":"object","properties":{"salesEmail":{"type":"string","description":"The email address for sales inquiries and support.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"feedbackAndSupportUrl":{"type":"string","description":"The URL for accessing the feedback and support resources.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"buyUrl":{"type":"string","description":"The URL for purchasing or upgrading the product.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"standalone":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the system is running in standalone mode.","example":true},"currentLicense":{"required":["dueDate","trial"],"type":"object","properties":{"trial":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the license is trial or not.","example":true},"dueDate":{"type":"string","description":"The date when the license expires.","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The current license information.","title":"CurrentLicenseInfo"},"max":{"type":"integer","description":"The maximum quota quantity.","format":"int32","example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The payment settings parameters.","title":"PaymentSettingsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"PaymentSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
